alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:56PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Boise and north central Elmore Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mores Creek Summit, or 12 miles south of Lowman, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Helende Campground and Graham Guard Station around 330 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Idaho.
